title: Flash Tank Material Balance (Binary Mixture)
statement:
A feed stream of 200 mol/min containing components A and B enters a flash tank. The feed composition is z_A = 0.30 and z_B = 0.70. The vapor stream leaving the tank has composition y_A = 0.55 and y_B = 0.45, while the liquid stream has composition x_A = 0.15 and x_B = 0.85. Assume steady-state operation.

(a) Write the overall and component A balances.
(b) Determine the vapor and liquid flow rates.

parts.prompt: Solve for the vapor flow rate, V.
Solve for the liquid flow rate, L.

notes: Material balances only; no equilibrium relations required. Use steady-state overall and component A balances.
